scripts.build:mp-weixin-pack: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build:mp-weixin && cross-env NODE_ENV=production uniapp2wxpack --build production --type weixin
scripts.dev:mp-weixin-pack: concurrently "npm run dev:mp-weixin" "cross-env NODE_ENV=development uniapp2wxpack --build development --type weixin"
scripts.build:mp-weixin-pack-plugin: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build:mp-weixin && cross-env NODE_ENV=production uniapp2wxpack --build production --plugin
scripts.dev:mp-weixin-pack-plugin: concurrently "npm run dev:mp-weixin" "cross-env NODE_ENV=development uniapp2wxpack --build development --plugin"
scripts.build:mp-alipay-pack-plugin: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build:mp-alipay && cross-env NODE_ENV=production uniapp2wxpack --build production --plugin --type alipay
scripts.dev:mp-alipay-pack-plugin: concurrently "npm run dev:mp-alipay" "cross-env NODE_ENV=development uniapp2wxpack --build development --plugin --type alipay"
scripts.build:mp-toutiao-pack: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build:mp-toutiao && cross-env NODE_ENV=production uniapp2wxpack --build production --type toutiao
scripts.dev:mp-toutiao-pack: concurrently "npm run dev:mp-toutiao" "cross-env NODE_ENV=development uniapp2wxpack --build development --type toutiao"
scripts.build:mp-alipay-pack: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build:mp-alipay && cross-env NODE_ENV=production uniapp2wxpack --build production --type alipay
scripts.dev:mp-alipay-pack: concurrently "npm run dev:mp-alipay" "cross-env NODE_ENV=development uniapp2wxpack --build development --type alipay"
scripts.build:mp-baidu-pack: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build:mp-baidu && cross-env NODE_ENV=production uniapp2wxpack --build production --type baidu
scripts.dev:mp-baidu-pack: concurrently "npm run dev:mp-baidu" "cross-env NODE_ENV=development uniapp2wxpack --build development --type baidu"
